trans-unit.source: Represents a virtual container service associated with an editing context and design view.
trans-unit.target: 表示与编辑上下文和设计视图相关联的虚拟容器服务。

trans-unit.source: The virtual container service is used to customize the UI virtualization behavior.
trans-unit.target: 此虚拟容器服务用于自定义 UI 虚拟化行为。

trans-unit.source: UI virtualization is used to render only the areas of the designer canvas that are currently in view, making the designer more responsive and less memory consuming.
trans-unit.target: UI 虚拟化用于呈现仅的区域的设计器画布中当前正在视图，使更快地响应在设计器和消耗内存更少。

trans-unit.source: By default, both procedural and flowchart designers are virtualization aware, but if you were to construct a control flow designer that would be larger than an individual screen, that designer could benefit from virtualization.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，过程和流程图设计器都支持虚拟化，但如果您打算构造控制流设计器中，将大于单个屏幕，该设计器无法受益于虚拟化。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.View.VirtualizedContainerService"></xref> class with a specific editing context.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.View.VirtualizedContainerService"></xref>用特定的编辑上下文的类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext"></xref> for the service.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext"> </xref>服务。

trans-unit.source: Gets a container and associates it with a specified model item and returns a UI element that represents the association.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个容器并将它与指定的模型项相关联，并返回表示此关联的 UI 元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref> associated with the container.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"> </xref>与容器关联。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ICompositeView"></xref> that is associated with the model item.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ICompositeView"> </xref>模型项与该键相关联。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that represents the container associated with the model item.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ，它表示与模型项相关联的容器。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to get a value for the Hint Size Name property.
trans-unit.target: 尝试获取 Hint Size Name 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: GetHintSize does not throw an exception if the property is not found in the store.
trans-unit.target: 如果在存储中找不到属性，GetHintSize 不引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The property store.
trans-unit.target: 属性存储区。

trans-unit.source: The destination <xref:System.Object> for the value.
trans-unit.target: 目标<xref:System.Object>的值。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns the workflow view element that corresponds to the specified model item.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定的模型项相对应的工作流视图元素。

trans-unit.source: The underlying model item of the workflow view element to get.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的工作流视图元素的基础模型项。

trans-unit.source: The drag source dependency property value to set for the workflow view element.
trans-unit.target: 拖动源依赖属性值设置为工作流视图元素。

trans-unit.source: The workflow view element that corresponds to the specified model item.
trans-unit.target: 对应于指定的模型项工作流视图元素。

trans-unit.source: Provides a XAML type system identifier.
trans-unit.target: 提供了一个 XAML 类型系统标识符。

trans-unit.source: The identifier is a string that consists of the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.VirtualizedContainerService> type plus "HintSize".
trans-unit.target: 标识符是组成一个字符串<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.VirtualizedContainerService>类型加上"hintsize"组成。</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.VirtualizedContainerService>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to set a value for the Hint Size Name property.
trans-unit.target: 尝试设置 Hint Size Name 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: This method parses the assigned `value` into a <xref:System.Windows.Size> object; therefore the string must be formatted using en-us culture.
trans-unit.target: 此方法分析分配`value`到<xref:System.Windows.Size>对象; 因此字符串必须使用进行格式设置 en-我们区域性。</xref:System.Windows.Size>

trans-unit.source: The property store.
trans-unit.target: 属性存储区。

trans-unit.source: The value set.
trans-unit.target: 设置的值。
